content: परिज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To be aware of; know, be acquainted with; वृषभोयमिति परिज्ञाय <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 126.</ls> {@--2@} To find out, ascertain; सम्यक् परिज्ञाय <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To recognise; तपस्विभिः कैश्चित्परिज्ञातोऽस्मि <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--4@} To observe, perceive.
परिज्ञा, परिज्ञानं {@--1@} Thorough knowledge, complete acquaintance. {@--2@} Recognition.
